name: Veken 47.2" Standing Desk, Adjustable Height Office Desk with Wood Desktop, Computer Table for Home Work, Study and Gaming, Small Spaces, Modern Furniture，Brown
short_description: Wood Texture: The desk boasts a high-quality wooden surface with a unique wood pattern that is both anti-slip and aesthetically pleasing; This natural and elegant look adds a touch of warmth and sophistication to your office space; Kindly Note that the desktop is divided into 2 pieces, not a whole piece

Effortless Assembly: All parts come pre-drilled for easy alignment, with clearly labeled components for quick identification, and a comprehensive instruction manual that provides detailed steps for a fast and trouble-free setup
Cable Clip Design: The desk features a cable clamp to neatly organize and secure cords, keeping your workspace tidy and clutter-free
Memory Preset: The electric desk comes with a memory mode function that stores your preferred desk heights; With just one touch, you can easily switch between sitting and standing positions

Smooth Height Adjustment: Our ergonomic desk can go from 28.3 Inches to as high as 46.5 Inches, all while keeping your comfort in mind; Built with Solid & Durable Materials: Sturdy, reliable, and solid; The Veken Electric Standing Desk, built with premium materials, ideal for laptops, desktops, and monitors

name: YILIFT Non-Electric Auto-Lifting Standing Desk, No Knobs or Crank, Cordless, Rolling and Mobile, Great for Walking Pad, Adjustable Height 28.1'' to 43.3'', Desktop Size 31.5'' by 15.7'', Color White
short_description: 【No More Knobs or Crank】This standing desk is auto-lifting, and the lowering down simply requires a push. The mechanism is pneumatic, so non-electric and cordless.
【Rolling and Mobile】With four lockable casters of reliable quality, this stand up desk can be a mobile desk workstation.
【Patented Technology】Owing to two invention patents on the gas spring, this sit stand desk has smooth height adjustment, and the auto-lifting is steady and comfortably slow.
【Great for Walking Pad】Not only fitting well with a walking pad, this standing desk with adjustable height can also serve as a computer desk, a study desk, and a work desk etc.

【Easy Assembly】On average, only 20 min installation, with instructions available in paper and video. Essentially, just three pre-assembled parts put together. The package contains everything you need.

name: Mobile Standing Desk, Pneumatic Adjustable Rolling Desk(31.5 Inches), Portable Laptop Desk with Wheels, Overbed Bedside Table Laptop Table for Couch, Home, Office, White
short_description: EASY HEIGHT ADJUSTMENT: The mobile standing desk is height adjustable from 25.9" to 42.1". Built-in gas spring that makes it easy to switch between sitting and standing positions

HIDDEN CASTERS: Rolling standing desk equipped with 4 hidden casters make it move the desk around easily on floors. A low-profile base with smooth rolling wheels eases and tuck beneath furniture minimum 1.2". Can be used as a small workstation next to sofa/ couch or bedside, rolling desk, bed reading tray, or recovery period rolling cart
PORTABLE STANDING DESK: 31.5" W x 15.7" D mobile workstation provides plenty of space for your daily use. Use it for your laptop or tablet, mouse, external keyboard, reading books, drawing and more
MULTIFUNCTIONAL LAPTOP DESK: This mobile desk is ideal for the office, school, classroom, hospital, medical clinic, conference room, training, tradeshow, home.Weight Capacity:17.6Lbs
EASY TO ASSEMBLE: We provide detailed step-by-step instructions with all the necessary hardware to help you assemble the mobile laptop desk

name: FLEXISPOT EN1 One-Piece Standing Desk, 48"x24" Seamless Desktop Electric Height Adjustable Desk for Home Office, Multi-Monitor Setups & Easy Assembly, White
short_description: ONE-PIECE. ZERO WOBBLE: A seamless, rock-solid desktop built for home offices, creative studios, and designers running multi-monitor setups.
SPACIOUS WORKSPACE FOR PRODUCTIVITY: Room for laptops, monitors, and accessories, giving writers, coders, or content creators freedom to organize and focus.
HEAVY-DUTY STABILITY & STRENGTH: Supports up to 176 lbs, giving office workers, architects, and gamers a steady, secure setup even during long, intensive sessions.
SIT OR STAND. YOUR CALL: Smooth electric height adjustment (28.9″–46.5″) with 4 memory presets keeps remote workers and designers comfortable and energized all day.
QUICK & EASY ASSEMBLY: Simplified setup with fewer steps and less lifting, ideal for busy professionals or first-time standing desk users who want a hassle-free start.

name: cdar Manual Standing Desk, Adjustable Height Game Desk, Hand Crank Standing Desk, Hand Lifting Computer Desk, Manual Stand Up Desk 100 cm
short_description: Non-Electric Manual Design: The manual standing desk offers a convenient crank lift system that allows you to adjust the desk height smoothly and quickly. Unlike electric standing desks, you won't have to worry about power cords cluttering up your workspace.

Spacious Working Space: Featuring a spacious desktop design, the office desk can provide spacious working space and storage capacity, offering a more comfortable working and studying experience. You'll have plenty of space to stay organized and maximize productivity.
Easy Assembly: The standing desk is easy to assemble and comes with a complete set of tools and parts, along with a detailed installation manual.

Benefit for Your Health: Standing desk encourages greater movement throughout your day while helping optimize your cognition, improve focus, enhance collaboration, reduced back and neck pain, increase productivity and boost calorie burn.
product_description: Item Name: Computer Desk Material: Wood Style: Simple Function: Office, Study Bearing: 150lbs Features: Hand Crank, Strong Load-bearing, Adjustable Height Size Details: 80cm, L: 80cm/31.5", W: 60cm/23.62", H: 85cm/33.46" (Approx.) 100cm, L: 100cm/39.37", W: 60cm/23.62", H: 85cm/33.46" (Approx.) 120cm, L: 120cm/47.24", W: 60cm/23.62", H: 85cm/33.46" (Approx.) Adjustable Height: 62cm-85cm/24.43"-33.49" (Approx.) Notes: Due to the light and screen setting difference, the item's color may be slightly different from the pictures. Please allow slight dimension difference due to different manual measurement. Package Includes: 1 x Computer Desk

name: S STAND UP DESK STORE Crank Adjustable Tier Standing Desk with Heavy Duty Steel Frame (Silver Frame/Dark Walnut Top, 48in Wide)
short_description: Two-level design places monitors, keyboard, and mouse at ergonomic, comfortable heights, whether sitting or standing
Hand crank height adjustment is simple, strong, and durable; crank can be positioned on either side of desk
Features include lockable casters for mobility and built-in cable management to keep cords tidy
Overall dimensions are 47" W x 28.5" D x 33.5" to 47.25" H (with included 3" casters installed); max weight capacity is 154 lbs; BIFMA certified for safety and durability; easy assembly
Stand Up Desk Store is a US-based company and stands behind all items we sell; this item comes with a limited lifetime warranty against defects

name: VIVO 32 inch Desk Converter, K Series, Height Adjustable Sit to Stand Riser, Dual Monitor and Laptop Workstation with Wide Keyboard Tray, Black, DESK-V000K
short_description: Create Instant Active Standing - VIVO’s desk riser provides on-demand standing throughout the day for the freedom to get out of your chair and relieve muscle tension, reduce stress, and increase productivity. --Patented--

Space Efficient 31.5" Surface - The top surface measures 31.5” x 15.7”, which maximizes space while still providing room for dual monitors. The 31.3" x 11.8" (10.5" in center) keyboard tray raises in sync with the top surface to create a comfortable workstation.

Strong 33 lbs Lift Assist - Go from sitting to standing in one smooth motion using the innovative simple touch height locking mechanism (Adjustment Range: 4.5" to 20"). Lift design elevates straight upwards.
Very Minimal Assembly - This riser is almost ready to go right out of the box! Place on your existing desk, attach the keyboard tray, and start organizing your workstation.
We've Got You Covered - Sturdy, high-grade steel design is backed with a 3-Year Manufacturer Warranty and friendly tech support to help with any questions or concerns.

name: UNICOO – L Shaped Crank Height Adjustable Standing Desk, Sit to Stand up Corner Desk, L-Shaped Standing Workstation (XJH-LC-2 Packages) (Rustic Brown)
short_description: Crank System: Enjoy a height range of 29.5" to 51.2" including tabletop with this frame’s manual hand crank system and strong legs using telescopic height adjustment. The handle is foldable to save space when not in use.
Easy to Adjust the Height: Using minimal effort to adjust the desired sitting and standing height by the simple crank system through the day. Speed:10mm/Turn.

Solid Construction: Heavy-duty powder coating double beam steel frame is stable and solid enough to allow for a 175lbs load capacity, strong support for your ideal working space. If you are looking for table can last for years, this table will be the best choice.
L-shaped Corner Table: The L shaped tabletop is made of MDF with high pressure scratch resistant laminate. The large table surface measuring 19.7” x 55.1” provides plenty of room for working.
Trustworthy: Manual sit stand desk with sturdy steel design is backed with a 1-year warranty for the frame and friendly tech support to help with any questions or concerns.
product_description: Unicoo– L Shaped Crank Height Adjustable Standing Desk, Sit to Stand up Corner Desk, L-Shaped Standing Workstation (White) Our Unicoo L-shaped corner table boasts a durable construction with its tabletop made from MDF and a high-pressure scratch-resistant laminate, offering a spacious work area measuring 19.7” x 55.1”. On top of that, the desk features a convenient crank system that allows you to effortlessly adjust the height from 29.5" to 51.2", inclusive of the tabletop. This system is equipped with strong telescopic legs and a foldable handle for space-saving when not in use. Enjoy both a generous workspace and versatile height adjustments with this functional and practical desk.

name: Stand Steady Tranzendesk | 55 Inch Standing Desk with Detachable Wheels | Crank Height Adjustable Sit to Stand Workstation | Modern Ergonomic Desk Supports 3 Monitors  (Cherry)
short_description: EASY HEIGHT ADJUSTMENTS: Take a stand for your health and say goodbye to the pain and stiffness that comes from sitting all day! This stand-up desk allows you to seamlessly transition from sitting to standing with an easy-turn crank, so you can achieve your perfect ergonomic posture

OPTIONAL ADDED WHEELS: With the option to attach full-swivels wheels, this Tranzendesk workstation is designed to fit your flexible workspace and roll with ease. Locking casters allow the portable desk to seamlessly transition from mobile to stationary

EXTRA TALL AND SPACIOUS: The Tranzendesk is a 55” full size standing desk that can adjust up to 54” tall! With nine square feet of desktop space, this desk provides plenty of room for your monitors, keyboard, and desk accessories

STURDY & DURABLE: The heavy-duty Tranzendesk supports up to 85 lbs, making it ideal for your double (or triple!) monitor set up. The leveling feet and strong steel base will keep your desk from wobbling back and forth as you work, assuring you stand steady, all day
DESIGNED FOR HOME & OFFICE: Whether you’re working remotely or in the office, the sleek and minimalist design of the Tranzendesk standing desk is sure to bring a high-end feel to your workspace

name: Mount-It! Manual Standing Desk Frame with Hand Crank, Adjustable Height Sit-Stand Desk Base for 48–72 Inch Tops, 132 lb Capacity, Power-Free Ergonomic Frame, Black (Frame Only)
short_description: Manual adjustable standing desk operation without power. Smooth hand crank lets you raise or lower your desk anytime—no motors, no wiring, and no outlets required, offering a dependable alternative to electric desks for daily use.

Frame-only design for true size flexibility. Fits most tabletops from 48" to 72" wide, allowing you to build a standing desk manual setup that matches your room layout, workflow, and preferred surface instead of being locked into a fixed size.
Heavy-duty steel frame built to last. All-steel construction supports up to 132 lbs, providing a stable foundation for solid wood, butcher block, or other heavier desktop materials.

Crank adjustable desk mechanism with fewer failure points. Mechanical lift system uses fewer moving parts than electric desks, reducing maintenance concerns and eliminating common motor and control failures over time.

Clear, guided assembly with video support. Includes step-by-step printed instructions with detailed images and written explanations for each stage, plus a full-length assembly video covering both frame setup and tabletop attachment.

Manual adjustable height range for sitting and standing. Adjusts from 28.7" to 47.6", supporting ergonomic seated and standing positions across home offices, classrooms, studios, and shared workspaces.

Long-term value without electronics. No power consumption, no electronic components, and no outlet required, making this a durable, flexible solution with lower lifetime ownership costs. Backed by Mount-It! lifetime warranty and supported by US-based technical support team.
